text: Banahaw Broadcasting Corporation was a Philippine public broadcasting that began operations on November 4, 1973, and ceased transmission on March 20, 1986. ==Local programming== *2 plus 2 *BBC Balita *BBC News Late Night Edition *BBC Primetime News *BBC Specials *The Big, Big Show *Kalatog Pinggan *Vilma on 2 ==Related pages== *Public broadcasting *Media == References == Category:Television networks in the Philippines Category:1973 establishments in Asia Category:1986 disestablishments Category:1970s establishments in the Philippines
title: Banahaw Broadcasting Corporation
